The track at Del Luce Stadium remains open for public use with proper social and physical distancing. We appreciate your cooperation and vigilance in abiding by proper social and physical distancing, including staying a minimum of 6 feet apart at all times.

Preliminary School Board Workshop Agenda
Thursday, April 23, 2020 p.m.

In accordance with An Act To Implement Provisions Necessary to the Health, Welfare and Safety of the Citizens of Maine in Response to the COVID-19 Public Health Emergency, as enacted to read: Sec G-1 1 MRSA Â§403-A Public proceedings through remote access during declaration of State of Emergency due to COVID-19, this workshop will be held through a ZOOM Meeting (teleconference for Board members and panelists and by webinar for citizens.Â The Workshop will be broadcast live on the Ellsworth High School Facebook page and YouTube Page (which will be shared to the City of Ellsworth YouTube Channel).Â The meeting will be recorded and made available on Spectrum Channel 1303.Â A link for Public Access via Zoom Webinar will be posted to the EHS Facebook page the morning of April 23, 2020
